description.elevator: Acme provides cloud-based project management software for distributed teams.
description.detailed:
Acme is a B2B SaaS company that provides project management and collaboration software designed specifically for distributed teams. The platform includes task management, video conferencing, document collaboration, and time tracking features integrated into a single interface.

Founded by former remote workers frustrated with existing tools, Acme focuses on asynchronous-first workflows that respect different time zones and work schedules. The company serves over 5,000 teams across 40 countries.

Acme differentiates through its emphasis on async communication, deep integrations with developer tools, and transparent pricing with no user limits.
description.founding: Founded in 2020 by three remote workers who experienced the challenges of coordinating across time zones firsthand during the COVID-19 pandemic.

primary.name: Acme Workspace
primary.description: All-in-one collaboration platform for remote teams with task management, video conferencing, and document sharing

primary.name: Acme API
primary.description: RESTful API for custom integrations and workflow automation

primary.name: Acme Mobile
primary.description: iOS and Android apps for on-the-go team collaboration

offerings.targetCustomers: Technology companies and digital agencies with 10-500 employees working remotely or in hybrid arrangements

metadata.notes: Example technology company profile demonstrating complete schema usage
